data.title: How to Stream All the 'Planet of the Apes' Movies
data.meta_description: Hulu has every film in the franchise.
data.text:
Interested in a Planet of the Apes movie marathon?

2024's Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes hit Hulu last week, joining the other nine films in the sci-fi franchise on the streamer. The film is set many generations after 2017's War for the Planet of the Apes and takes audiences on the journey of a young ape named Noa. The choices he makes "will define a future for apes and humans alike," according to an official synopsis.

Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes stars Owen Teague, Freya Allan, Kevin Durand, Peter Macon and William H. Macy. Wes Ball, who helmed the three Maze Runner movies, directs. Here's every Planet of the Apes entry listed in release order, from the original 1968 film to Kingdom, and how a VPN can assist if you're streaming them.

How to watch all the Planet of the Apes movies

Planet of the Apes (1968) -- Hulu

Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970) -- Hulu

Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971) -- Hulu

Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972) -- Hulu

Battle for the Planet of the Apes (1973) -- Hulu

Planet of the Apes (2001) -- Hulu

Rise of the Planet of the Apes (2011) -- Hulu

Dawn of the Planet of the Apes (2014) -- Hulu, Max

War for the Planet of the Apes (2017) -- Hulu, Max

Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes (2024) -- Hulu
